My Work Experience

Here are some of the projects I worked on...

Java Developer

De Volksbank - July 2017 till Sept. 2018

Within the domain Klant Wil Betalen of the Volksbank there are a number of projects for which development capacity is required. One of them is Payment Service Directive 2, in short PSD2. A directive for which the EU wants to create a uniform payment market by establishing a single legal framework for payment transactions within the EU. The Volksbank must also comply with this EU directive.

CGI has delivered a scrum team to the Volksbank to work on this project. Jonathan is part of this scrum team. During the PSD2 project, Jonathan focused on the communication between the frontend and the backend. His activities include creating REST APIs and writing tests for the new functionality.

The PSD2 project was delivered on time and with good quality. The customer was satisfied with Jonathan's commitment. Following the PSD2 project Jonathan worked as a fullstack developer on a new project Payment Request.

Tools and techniques: IntelliJ, Jira, Confluence, Java, JUnit, Maven, Git, AngularJS, Scrum, Cucumber / Protractor, Jasmine, Postman & SQL.

SharePoint Developer

Shell - Feb. 2016 till April 2018

During this period Jonathan was assigned to Shell as a SharePoint developer. He was part of the SharePoint Solution Factory team. Its role is to ensure that SharePoint sites are set up correctly, in alignment with Shell standards and Enterprise plans. His responsibilities are namely to:

  • Configure SharePoint Sites, Lists and Libraries
  • Developing custom web parts
  • Permission provisioning on sites, lists & libraries
  • Creating SharePoint 2010/2013 workflows & Powershell scripts
  • Content migration using ShareGate
  • Delivering support to customers

Tools and techniques: SharePoint Designer 2013, ShareGate, PowerShell, CSOM/JSOM, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JQuery.

Masterclass Java

CGI - Oct. 2015 till Nov. 2015

In October 2015 Jonathan took part in a Masterclass Java organized by CGI to wide-ning his development skills. During the Masterclass he got intensive training under guidance of a professional trainer. The Masterclass Java consist of Object Oriented Programming(OOP), UML modelling, continuous integration and continuous delivery. Jonathan successfully completed the Java Masterclass. He is now certified in Java SE7 Oracle Certified Associate(OCA) and Oracle Certified Professional(OCP).

Tools and techniques: Java, Maven, SQL & Netbeans.

Microsoft .NET Developer

CGI - May 2015 till Aug. 2015

Within Shell, there are many legacy applications that are listed for renewal. In order to shorten the development time for the rebuilding these legacy applications, Jonathan has developed a website template. During the design of the template, Jonathan has paid much attention to user-friendliness and responsive design. By using the template, developers can now focus on the primary functionalities of the application. This will lead to better quality and shorter development times. Jonathan has also developed a website using the project template, where developers can quickly acquaint themselves with various Kendo UI components.

Tools and techniques: Visual Studio, Visual Studio Online, Kendo UI, C#, ASP.NET MVC, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap.

Masterclass Microsoft

CGI - Jan. 2015 till April 2015

Jonathan started his career at CGI participating in a Microsoft masterclass. During the masterclass he got intensive training under guidance of a professional coach. The masterclass Microsoft consist of:

  • Programming in HTML5 with Javascript & CSS3
  • Developing ASP.NET MVC Web Applications
  • Developing Web API's using Entity Framework

He successfully completed the Micorosoft masterclass. He is now certified as MCSD: Web Applications.

Tools and techniques: Visual Studio, Visual Studio Online, C#, ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework, Web API, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

Magic Developer

Able - Sept. 2013 till Aug. 2014

Jonathan successfully completed the traineeship Magic Developer at Able. Able is a specialist in the field of development and business processing of software platforms for investment and savings. As a trainee Jonathan was responsible for delivering support for users, fixing bugs and developing new functionalities for the Europort+ platform.

Tools and techniques: Magic, Jira & SQL
